Description: Five yuletide romances about divine intervention include Mary Balogh's "Guarded by Angels," Marilyn Campbell's "The Trouble With Angelina," Carole Nelson Douglas's "Catch a Falling Angel," Emma Merritt's "Brush of Angel Wings," and Patricia Rice's "Tin Angel." Original..
